mainTitle: Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA) & Privacy by Design and Default
mainDescription: Data Rights in E-Commerce empower individuals to control how their data is collected, used, stored, and shared...
dpiaDescription: DPIAs evaluate the potential impact of data processing activities on personal data protection.

requirements.title: Report Submission:
requirements.summary: Submit the DPIA report to the Data Protection Authority.

requirements.title: Consultation with the Authority:
requirements.summary: Consult the Authority if high risk remains.

requirements.title: Data Subject Rights:
requirements.summary: Uphold rights like access, rectification, and erasure.

requirements.title: Data Breach Notification:
requirements.summary: Report breaches to authorities and individuals.

requirements.title: Privacy Policies:
requirements.summary: Provide clear information about data usage.

challenges: Complexity of requests, data accuracy, technical limitations, balancing interests.
selfAssessmentDescription: A self-assessment checklist helps organizations ensure compliance with data protection laws.

checklist.title: Categories of Personal Data and Data Subjects:
checklist.summary: List categories and elements of data.

checklist.title: Retention Period:
checklist.summary: Define retention periods for each data category.
